alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 6:09PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Faulkner, central Saline and Pulaski Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 609 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Little Italy to near Chenal Valley to 7 miles west of Salem in Saline County. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Conway... Benton... Sherwood... Jacksonville... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Mayflower... Wrightsville... Argenta... Otter Creek... Little Italy... Gravel Ridge... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central Arkansas.
